content: wrap yourself up this winter with the in the clouds scarf effortlessly light yet incredibly warm this easy crochet scarf is great for crochet beginners this design uses single crochets and chains to create a simple yet unique stitch texture that s also easily customisable for more advanced crocheters this is the perfect project for a relaxing crochet break in front of a fire or the tv this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face size one size with alteration suggestions skill level beginner check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
